input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
NEROY Special Design High Quality 925 Sterling Silver Blue Fire Created Opal Engagement Rings for Girls Size 6 7 8 9 10 Or663A

Item specifications:
Material: Lab Created Gemstone / Crystal
Top Quality/Never Fade/Brand New Design , Antiallergy
Smooth edge comfort fit
Pefect fashion accessory rings for many occations,Parties,Engagement,Wedding,Family Unity,etc.Pefect fashion accessory
Gift box included
input_text.Response A:
with order
Size: 6 7 8 9 10
It's time to get your hands on this amazing fashion accessory! The special design of this ring is sure to turn heads and make you the center of attention. The blue fire created opal is unique and will make you stand out from the crowd. It's the perfect accessory for any occasion, from weddings to parties to everyday wear. The smooth edge comfort fit will ensure that it's not only beautiful but also comfortable to wear. 

This ring comes in a beautiful gift box, making it the perfect gift for a loved one or yourself. 

Make this ring yours today and start turning heads wherever you go!
input_text.Response B: This is the perfect fashion accessory rings for many occasions, such as Parties, Engagement, Wedding, Family Unity, and so on. The rings are made of high-quality 925 Sterling Silver and Blue Fire Created Opal, which is smooth, comfortable, and won't fade. The edge of the ring is smooth and comfortable, which makes it perfect for everyday wear. The ring comes in a gift box, ready for you to give to that special someone.
